description: staircase with decorative metal railings; large crucifix on wood stand at bottom left of staircase; figure at top of stairs (ascending) is shadowed on wall
inscription: Signature, Title, Date, Inscription and Artist\'s Stamp
markings: on verso artist\'s stamp in blue; in stamp in pencil: [© 20 OCT 2000 / NEG.NO. CZE2  PRINT NO: G21218 2000 / STAIRS  ST. VITUS CATHEDRAL / CESKY KRUMLOV, CZECH REPUBLIC / M12192000]
signed: on sheet below image in black: [FRED SCHEEL]
title: Stairs St. Vitus Cathedral, Czeský, Krumlov, Czech Republic
